Articles.Content:
Well, after randomly running into what turned out to be a fellow KSP player at lunch today (seriously, what a coincidence!) I'm here on a slightly newer refurb laptop, downloading 1.4.2. Considering my first version was 0.20 (I think, it was $18!), i'm looking forward to exploring again!

Heeeeeeeeeere we go again!
Howdy and welcome to the forum.
